name: Ship & Shoot (48toPlay 2020 Game Jam)
description:
Ship & Shoot  is a game made in one week at the 48toplay 2020 GameJam.
Theme: Distance 
(Play it on the web on the free AirConsole platform, click download button below to go to the game page)

Ship & Shoot

Ship & Shoot is a local multiplayer Battle Royale game where you have to be the last ship standing.
Ships are placed on the edge of a circle that gets smaller over time. 

But wait... After a few rounds the game have a few surprises;)

How to Play

This is important. The game is made for the AirConsole platform, that means that the game is played on your web browser, but each player plays using your mobile device.

Please click the Download button below to open the game web page on your computer. And open www.airconsole.com on your mobile device to connect to the game.

Controls

The controls are in your mobile device. 
You only have two buttons to move Left and Right.

Credits
